source_objects.title: Management
source_objects.description: Take your management skills to the next level with these course in negotiation, leadership, people management and more.

items.title: Essentials of Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) Business
items.headline: Learn the essentials of emerging field so that you can become the new business or marketing rockstar of SaaS!
objectives_summary: Create basics of solid business and marketing strategies for SaaS companies.
Learn the essence of what does it mean to be in SaaS business compared to traditional software.
Learn the key KPIs and metrics that matter in SaaS world.

items.title: Excel Pivot Tables for Management Consultants & Analysts

visible_instructors.job_title: Expert in performance improvement, turnaround and startups
visible_instructors.name: Asen
visible_instructors.title: Asen Gyczew

items.headline: Practical guide how to do data and business analyses using Pivot Tables during consulting projects
objectives_summary: You will master the most crucial functions and features of Excel Pivot Tables
Understand the main challenges in analyzing data with Pivot Tables
Do calculation directly in the Pivot Table without impacting the original data set

items.title: How to Become a Workplace Coach: The Fundamentals
items.headline: Coaching Skills Series (Part 1)
objectives_summary: Confidently apply a coaching style of management
Take away some practical coaching tools that can be used right away
Gain great results and build better relationships at work

items.title: Quality Management for Business Excellence

visible_instructors.job_title: Experienced Quality Director • Six Sigma Coach • Consultant
visible_instructors.name: Sandeep Kumar
visible_instructors.title: Sandeep Kumar ­

items.headline: Lead Quality Management in the Organization • Transform the Organization to Become the Best-in-Class
objectives_summary: This course provides the basic Quality Management knowledge, that each employee in the organization should have.
Understand what makes some organizations best-in-class organization.
How to take the quality of your product or service to the next level?

items.title: Customer Experience Management (CX): MASTERCLASS 2021

visible_instructors.job_title: Published Author, Course Creator. 35,000+ Unique Students
visible_instructors.name: Manos
visible_instructors.title: Manos Filippou

items.headline: #1 Customer Experience Management Course. Discover The Art Of A Client-Centric Culture. Customer Journey. B2B. B2C.
objectives_summary: *** NEW 2021 ***: A massive update with 54 new lectures (YES, you read it correctly, 54 NEW lectures!), and 4 hours and 20 minutes of additional training!
*** NEW 2021 ***: The pandemic changed the way we live and do business. This course provides everything you need to know about CX in this new reality.

Customer Experience Management (CX) on Steroids! This course includes a Guide/Cheat Sheet for busy professionals who do not have a lot of time, and want to acquire the most important information about Customer Experience (CX) with the least effort possible! In just 30 minutes learn everything you need to know about CX!

items.title: Complete GDPR, GDPR Certification, data protection, privacy

visible_instructors.job_title: Business  Academic, Entrepreneur & Coach to CEOs
visible_instructors.name: Robert Sullivan,
visible_instructors.display_name: Robert Sullivan, MA, MBA, FistlLM, FRSA FHEA
visible_instructors.title: Robert Sullivan, MA, MBA, FistlLM, FRSA FHEA

items.headline: Best Selling GDPR, GDPR CERTIFICATION, GDPR Foundation, general data protection regulation, data privacy, April 21
objectives_summary: You will be able to explain what the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) is
You will understand that almost everyone including private individuals, employees and employers need to know about the GDPR
You will be easily able to discuss why there was a need for the GDPR

items.title: Talent Development for Leaders: Develop Your High-Potentials
items.headline: Become a talent management leader and develop your employees for success!
objectives_summary: You’ll grow your own leadership skills and success, with the tools to become famous for talent development in your organization
You'll develop your employees, helping them to achieve career success
You’ll create pragmatic learning plans that create growth that sticks

items.title: Effectively Managing Employee Performance

visible_instructors.job_title: Smarter Training. Never Open a Textbook.
visible_instructors.name: LearnSmart
visible_instructors.title: LearnSmart LLC

items.headline: Learn how to prevent performance problems, identify, counsel, and take action.
objectives_summary: This course will help you better manage and prevent performance problems through a number of strategies, from hiring the right candidate to delivering performance feedback. You will be able to identify performance problems and zoom in on their causes.

You will have a thorough understanding of how to evaluate employee performance, and identify any performance issues. You will have acquired the skills, knowledge, and strategies that are used to discipline an employee experiencing performance issues.

items.title: Management Coaching Employee Performance Coach Certification

visible_instructors.job_title: International Academy of Life Coaching & Entrepreneurship
visible_instructors.name: Transformation
visible_instructors.title: Transformation Services

items.headline: Set expectations, assess performance, provide feedback, increase productivity, develop employee potential
objectives_summary: Understand the role of a manager coach and why it benefits your employee and your organization
Empower your employees to reach their potential, develop their competency, improving their ability to contribute to the organization
Develop a strong relationship of trust and admiration by letting your employee know you believe in them and are committed to providing them the support they need to succeed

items.title: Lean Management: Reduce waste and boost efficiency

visible_instructors.job_title: Practical, applicable courses for career growth
visible_instructors.name: PracticalGrowth
visible_instructors.title: PracticalGrowth

items.headline: Learn how to use the principles of lean management to optimize production, eliminate waste, and maximize customer value
objectives_summary: What lean management is and how to make it work for your organization
How to effectively lead and improve your team using lean principles
Eliminating unnecessary tasks and delays in your production process

items.title: Conflict Management at Work: Real World Strategies & Tools

visible_instructors.job_title: Real World Trainer in Personal Effectiveness
visible_instructors.name: Mike
visible_instructors.title: Mike Clayton

items.headline: A Practical Introduction to Workplace Conflict Management for Managers and Supervisors
objectives_summary: Recognize the signs of conflict early, so you have a chance to stop it
Reduce the incidence of conflict, by listening well
Understand how conflict escalates, so you can stay calm and stop the escalation

items.title: An Introduction to Emotional Intelligence
items.headline: Learn how your emotional intelligence influences how you perform, build relationships and make good quality decisions.
objectives_summary: Recognise the importance of understanding the emotions that you experience.
Examine how to practise and learn how to develop emotional intelligence.
Discover how to improve your relationships and performance by gaining insights into the emotions of other people.

items.title: Manage Diversity
items.headline: Gain the tools you need to encourage positive interactions and coach your team to the next level.
objectives_summary: Learn from diversity
Say & do the right things
Treat everyone with respect

items.title: Taking the Pain Out of Collaboration: Tips & Best Practices
items.headline: What to do before, during, and after a cross-team collaboration
objectives_summary: Tools, templates, and techniques for leading (and participating) in a cross-team collaboration
Explore the organizing principles of cross-team collaboration
Create a strong foundation for a high-impact collaboration

items.title: Performance Management: Build a High Performing Team
items.headline: Transform the way you manage your teams performance
objectives_summary: Connect the organisational vision with task level objectives
Write concise, specific and attainable objectives
Measure performance effectively

items.title: Management - Leadership, Negotiating, Assertiveness, Sales
items.headline: A practical guide covering assertiveness, time management, leadership, negotiating, sales & project management.
objectives_summary: Understand a wide range of management techniques
Be a better manager at all levels
Negotiate effectively to save thousands
